ComicInfo.Title: Planet Hulk Exile Part III
ComicInfo.Summary: Planet Hulk Exile Part III: Caiera offers Hulk a way out of the arena but he refuses her. The Emperor's Death's Head guards attack the arena during a match, killing Captain Skee and forging an even stronger bond among the gladiators.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:26:19. [CVDB112742] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:56:18. [Issue ID 323561]

ComicInfo.Characters: Brood,Caiera,Korg,Miek,Hulk [Bruce Banner],Captain Lavin Skee,Heroim,Elloe,Silver Surfer (cameo),Red King
